hero.subtitle: Journey through ancient Silk Road cities, marvel at stunning Islamic architecture, and experience the warm hospitality of Central Asia's crown jewel.

cities.title: Explore Uzbekistan's Historic Cities
cities.subtitle: Each city tells a unique story of the Silk Road's golden age

video.title: Experience Uzbekistan
video.subtitle: Watch our immersive video to see the beauty and culture of Uzbekistan come to life

samarkand.name: Samarkand
samarkand.description: The crown jewel of the Silk Road, home to the magnificent Registan Square

bukhara.name: Bukhara
bukhara.description: A living museum with over 140 architectural monuments

khiva.name: Khiva
khiva.description: A perfectly preserved ancient city, frozen in time

termez.name: Termez
termez.description: Ancient Buddhist heritage meets Islamic architecture

tashkent.name: Tashkent
tashkent.description: The modern capital with a rich blend of old and new

advantages.title: Why Choose Explore Uzbekistan
advantages.subtitle: We provide comprehensive travel solutions with attention to every detail, ensuring your journey through Uzbekistan is comfortable, authentic, and unforgettable.

transport.title: Premium Transport
transport.description: Modern, air-conditioned vehicles with experienced drivers for comfortable journeys between cities

hotels.title: Quality Hotels
hotels.description: Carefully selected accommodations ranging from comfortable 3-star to luxury 5-star properties

guides.title: Expert Guides
guides.description: Licensed local guides with deep knowledge of history, culture, and hidden gems of each destination

licensed.title: Licensed & Certified
licensed.description: All our guides are licensed and our company is certified by Uzbekistan tourism authorities.

reviews.title: 5-Star Reviews
reviews.description: Consistently rated 5 stars by travelers on TripAdvisor, Google, and other platforms.

insurance.title: Travel Insurance
insurance.description: Comprehensive travel insurance included in Premium and VIP packages for peace of mind.

packages.title: Choose Your Adventure
packages.subtitle: From comfortable group tours to luxury private experiences, we have the perfect package to match your travel style and create unforgettable memories in Uzbekistan.

standard.name: Standard Package
standard.description: Perfect introduction to Uzbekistan's highlights with comfortable accommodations and guided group tours.
features: Group sightseeing in major cities with guide
Daily breakfast + some meals per itinerary
standard.includes: Budget accommodation, breakfast, group tours, basic support

premium.name: Premium Package
premium.description: Enhanced experience with quality hotels, private transport, and authentic local experiences.
premium.includes: 4-star hotels, curated meals, private transport, local experiences

vip.name: VIP Package
vip.description: Ultimate luxury experience with boutique hotels, VIP services, and exclusive access throughout.
features: 4★ or 5★ boutique luxury hotels with meals
vip.includes: Luxury hotels, VIP services, custom experiences, full concierge

ui.planAdventureDesc: Tell us about your travel preferences and we'll create the perfect Uzbekistan experience for you.
